DOC.brief_summary: This study wish compare patient satisfaction cosmesis two different closure method laparoscopic port . One method use tissue adhesive ( Dermabond ) deep sub-cutaneous stitch Band-Aid dressing . The comparison method use 3.o undyed vicryl transcutaneous stitch , Bacitracin Tegaderm dressing .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Different Closure Methods Laparoscopic Port Sites
DOC.criteria: gynecologic laparoscopy patient know sensitivity tissue adhesive , antibiotic ointment
